summary_reasoning: The Council UNANIMOUSLY APPROVES the move to Rank-Based Signal Generation. The 'Probability Threshold' approach has failed due to lack of Volatility in the model's outputs. Forcing the model to rank assets is the logical next step to extract edge. WARNING: Transaction costs will skyrocket.

role_verdicts.QuantResearcher: APPROVE. (Independent Vote) Rank-based portfolios (Long Top Decile, Short Bottom Decile) are standard in equity factors. This is much more robust than absolute thresholds.
role_verdicts.RiskOfficer: APPROVE. (Independent Vote) Concern: High turnover. Ensure we don't churn the portfolio every hour if ranks are noisy.
role_verdicts.RealismChecker: APPROVE. (Independent Vote) Finally, you're trading like a prop desk. Always be in the best stuff.
